name: Angulpar Seed
tagline: 100% Gulp based automated builds, Swagger automated client generation based on API definition
body:
### Welcome to Angulpar seed.
You can use this project as a boilerplate removal for an full JS Stack Architechture, includes friendly CI-CD Travis integration and Firebase login is enabled and defined in Swagger as an example

### What for?
The main idea is to have a Angular/NodeJS project with a Swagger defined API to connect with and Elastic Search back-end, all the CI-CD process is automated and working out-of-the-box (when finished)

### Current Status
I finished migration to Gulp, I am connect the Swagger Client code generation in Gulp ATM, I will move the Firebase
login logic from the AngularJS to the NodeJS to have real security, after that everything will be automated and only changing 1 field in Swagger API will generate a new client so we just define the API and use it for doing things, not need to implement the call, with the promise etc etc, the client is Angular auto-generated code

### Authors and Contributors
Thanks to [JohnCreek](https://github.com/JohnCreek) for the github image used in my header.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](sloppy@sloppylopez.com) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
